author: Zhou, JM; Ge, JB

title: Qiliqiangxin Improves Cardiac Function through Regulating Energy Metabolism via HIF-1 alpha-Dependent and Independent Mechanisms in Heart Failure Rats after Acute Myocardial Infarction
